nodes.bodyText: Didn't know if there was a better way to include this?  I guess there is no renderer to attach to so I guess this is OK.
No renderer. Don´t know a better place. It´s the same FileDownloadActionListener does.
Done. I always search for StringUtils and can´t remember LangUtils...
I wonder if this could be moved to ResourceUtils as a static method and reused between FileDownload and this?
Good point. Fixed. (Just migrated old and not so perfect code before.)

This is the only line that gives me pause as it required JAXB to be on the classpath to work. What about java.util.Base64 and doing
String encoded = Base64.getEncoder().withoutPadding().encodeToString(someByteArray);
Good Point. I also fixed this for DynamicContentSrcBuilder.
Awesome! I think that is better

I would keep ExportConfiguration  in export method, having a setter makes your API tricky to use since it must be called before export method (and there is nothing to guarantee that, also exporters should be as much stateless as possible)
getContentType: should only return content type without charset, do the concatenation in DataExporter#processAction
getFileExtension: I don't know if a file extension includes a dot or not...
